sections.title: Commencement
paragraphs: Saturday, May 16, 2026, at Credit Union 1 Arena in Chicago

Illinois Institute of Technology’s 157th Commencement will take place at University of Illinois at Chicago’s Credit Union 1 Arena, on Saturday, May 16, 2026. Please check this page regularly in the coming months for information and important updates regarding Commencement.
sections.full_text:
Saturday, May 16, 2026, at Credit Union 1 Arena in Chicago
Illinois Institute of Technology’s 157th Commencement will take place at University of Illinois at Chicago’s Credit Union 1 Arena, on Saturday, May 16, 2026. Please check this page regularly in the coming months for information and important updates regarding Commencement.

sections.title: 2026 Commencement Ceremonies
paragraphs: There will be two separate, combined college-level ceremonies held on Saturday, May 16, 2026. The first combined ceremony will begin at 9 a.m. (CDT). The second combined ceremony will begin at 2 p.m. (CDT). The colleges for each ceremony will be confirmed during the spring semester.
A separatePh.D. Hooding Ceremonywill be held on Friday, May 15, 2026, in the McCormick Auditorium in Hermann Hall on Mies Campus beginning at 10:30 a.m. (CDT).
Commencement forChicago-Kent College of Lawwill take place at 2:30 p.m. on Sunday, May 17, 2026, at theThe Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum—UIC Forum.
